activities.name: Get Config Value in Clound Storage

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT VAL1,VAL3,VAL4,NULLIF(VAL7,'''') AS VAL7 from ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE c.LOV_TYPE= ''',variables('lovType'),''' AND c.LOV_NAME = ''',variables('lovName'),''' AND c.ACTIVE_FLG =''Y''')

text.value:
@concat('DELETE FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_TEMP_FILE_ARPU 
    WHERE FILE_ID IN(SELECT FILE_ID 
                        FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_TEMP_FILE 
                        WHERE STATUS = ''S'' 
                        AND FILE_TYPE = ''',variables('FILE_TYPE'),''')')

activities.name: If Configval is nul or Some Config val is Null

dependsOn.activity: Get Config Value in Clound Storage

expression.value: @or(not(contains(string(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output),'firstRow')),or(or(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,''))),empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,'')))),empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,'')))))

value.value: @if(empty(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val7),'',activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val7)

ifTrueActivities.name: insert error when config val error

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_REVIEW 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	REVIEW_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',
	''',variables('REVIEW_TYPE'),''',
	''E'',''',
	if(not(contains(string(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output),'firstRow')),concat('Config LOV_TYPE : ',variables('lovType'),' ,LOV_NAME : ',variables('lovName'),' Data not found.'),concat('Config ',
	if(startswith(
	concat(if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,''))),',Input path(val1)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,''))),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,''))),',file type Input file(val4)',''))
	,','),substring(
	concat(if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,''))),',Input path(val1)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,''))),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,''))),',file type Input file(val4)',''))
	,1,sub(length(
	concat(if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,''))),',Input path(val1)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,''))),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,''))),',file type Input file(val4)',''))
	),1)),
	concat(if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,''))),',Input path(val1)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,''))),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,''))),',file type Input file(val4)',''))
	)
	,' Data not found.')),''');')

activities.name: Get All FIle in Config directory

expression.value: @or(empty(activity('Filter file Sync').output.Value),not(activity('Get All FIle in Config directory').output.exists))

ifTrueActivities.name: insert review process file sync not have input file

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_REVIEW 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	REVIEW_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) OUTPUT INSERTED.REVIEW_ID VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.LOV_TYPE_REVIEW,''',
	''S'',''File prefix : ',pipeline().parameters.prefixInputFile,' data not found in path ',pipeline().parameters.inputPath,''');')

dependsOn.activity: Get All FIle in Config directory

text.value:

	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,

activities.name: Switch case error or process Dat

on.value: @if(not(and(activity('Get File size Dat').output.exists,equals(variables('fileDatSize'), string(string(if(contains(activity('Get File size Dat').output,'size'),activity('Get File size Dat').output?.size,0)))))),'file size/name not map',pipeline().parameters.processDatName)

activities.name: update file dat data not mapping

text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_REVIEW 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,
	''', STATUS = ''E'',',
	' DESCRIPTION = ''file name data not found/file size no mapping file result ',variables('fileinputName'),'''',
	' WHERE REVIEW_ID =',variables('reviewId'),';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_REVIEW

	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',

	''', STATUS = ''E'',',

text.value:

    SET PROCESS_TYPE = ''09|',activity('SELECT old 09').output.firstrow.OLD_COUNT,'''

    WHERE FILE_ID = ',variables('tempFileDatId'),' AND PROCESS_TYPE = ''09''')
